what: Fit the regression model using the lm() function.
title: betaDelta: Example
code: object <- lm(QUALITY ~ NARTIC + PCTGRT + PCTSUPP, data = df)

previous_headings: Estimate the standardized regression slopes and the corresponding sampling covariance matrix.
title: betaDelta: Example

previous_headings: Estimate the standardized regression slopes and the corresponding sampling covariance matrix.
title: betaDelta: Example
betaDelta: Example
code: mvn <- BetaDelta(object, type = "mvn") adf <- BetaDelta(object, type = "adf")

title: betaDelta: Example
text: Summary results BetaDelta().

title: betaDelta: Example
text: Calculate standardized regression slopes.
code: coef(mvn) #>    NARTIC    PCTGRT   PCTSUPP  #> 0.4951451 0.3914887 0.2632477 coef(adf) #>    NARTIC    PCTGRT   PCTSUPP  #> 0.4951451 0.3914887 0.2632477

text: betaDelta betaSandwich available Comprehensive R Archive Network (CRAN) (https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=betaDelta, https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=betaSandwich). Documentation examples can found accompanying websites (https://jeksterslab.github.io/betaDelta, https://jeksterslab.github.io/betaSandwich).
